section.title: Ingestion Schema
section.para: All data to be ingested by &PRODUCT; must follow the &INGESTIONSCHEMANAME; XML Schema. This schema is based on the Ed-Fi Core Schema (version &EDFIVERSION;) for describing educational data. See for a general description of the schemas and interchanges.

The &INGESTIONSCHEMANAME; XML Schema is published as a series of XSD files, compressed into a single .zip archive, available for download from https://inbloom.org/library. Scroll to the Data Management section and click inBloom ingestion extension schemas.
The .zip archive contains the "Core" file and the series of "Interchange" files.

For a list of the interchanges and their entity mappings, see
and .
